msContents.summary:
I) Zenā nagaromu la-śǝllāse “Story of the Trinity” (fols. 7ra-50vb) I-1) Introductory Homily (fols. 7ra-13va) I-2) Homily for the month of Miyazya (fols. 13va-14va) I-3) Homily for the month of Gǝnbot (fols. 14va-15vb) I-4) Homily for the month of Säne (fols.15vb-17ra) I-5) Homily for the month of Ḥamle (fols. 17ra-24vb) I-6) Homily for the month of Näḥase (fols. 25ra-26rb) I-7) Homily for the month of Ṗagwǝmen (fols. 26rb-27vb) I-8) Homily for the month of Maskaram (fols. 27vb-31va) I-9) Homily for the month of Ṭǝqǝmt (fols. 31va-32ra) I-10) Homily for the month of Ḫǝdar (fols. 32rb-33rb) I-11) Homily for the month of Tāḫśāś (fols. 33rb-34ra) I-12) Homily for the month of Ṭǝrr (fols. 34ra-36ra) I-13) Homily for the month of Yäkkatit (fols. 36ra-37rb) I-14) Homily for the month of Mäggabit (fols. 37ra-39ra) I-15) Dǝrsan za-ʿaśǝrtu-wä-kǝlʾǝtu ʾawraḫ “Homily for the 12 months” (fols. 39ra-50vb) II) Täʾamrihomu la-ʾab wa-wald wa-mänfäs qǝddus “Miracles of the Father and the Son and the Holy Spirit”: 64 miracles (fols. 51ra-105rb)
Additiones 1-3; colophon.
msContents.colophon: f. 105rb: ይትባረክ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ ዘአፈጸመኒ፡ በኢድልወትየ፡ ዘጸሐፍኩ፡ ኃጥእ፡ ወጊጉይ፡ ንዑሰ፡ ዓቅም፡ ኃይለ፡ ማርያም፡ ፲ወ፱፻፳፪ዓመተ፡ ምሕረተ፡ በዘመነ፡ ምንግሥታ፡ ለንግሥትነ፡ አስካለ፡ ማርያም፡ አመ፡ ፱ለወርኃ፡ መስከረም፡ በሰላመ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አሜን። The scribe Ḫayla Māryām has completed the Ms. on 9 Maskaram 1922 year of mercy (= September 19, 1929 A.D.) during the reign Queen Zäwditu (r. 1916-30; baptismal name ʾAskalä Māryām).

handDesc.handNote: Fine, regular. Black, red (changing hues in the red ink, e.g., strong vermillion and vivid scarlet on fol. 76r). Ḫayla MāryāmAccording to the colophon the Ms. was written by Ḫayla Māryām.20th cent.

decoDesc.decoNote: Nomina sacra; names of the donor; doxology (also alternating in red and black letters, e.g., fols. 13va, 14va, 15vb, 39ra); groups of lines alternating with black lines on the incipit page of Texts I, II; groups of lines alternating with black lines in the incipit of each section in Text I; incipit of each section in Text II; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.
f. 7r: Coloured (red, green, white, yellow, orange, blue) ornamental band; interlaces, geometrical motifs.

list.item:
ff. 1va-4vb, 105vab: Malkǝʾa śǝllāse “Image of the Trinity” (ChRep 191, no. 20). ff. 1va: ሰላም፡ ለህላዌክሙ፡ ዘይመውዕ፡ ህላዌያት። ለረኪበ፡ ስሙ፡ ኅቡዕ፡ አመ፡ ወጠንኩ፡ ተምኔተ። እምግብርክሙ፡ ሥላሴ፡ ሶበ፡ ረከብኩ፡ አስማተ፨…
Written in a fine hand, possibly the same hand which inserted some of the names in the supplication formulas.

f. 105rab: Transaction note. f. 105rab: ዝንቱ፡ መጽሐፍ፡ ዘኃለቃ፡ ገብረ፡ እግዚአብሔር፡ አርአያ፡ ዖምጽጌ፡ ዘሴጦ፡ በ፵፬ብር፡ መድኅኑ፡ አቶ፡ ወልደ፡ ሚካኤል፡ ካህሳይ፡ … በዘመነ፡ ማርቆስ፡ ወንጌላዊ፡ በመስፍንነ፡ ራስ፡ ጉግሣ፡ በጳጳስነ፡ ማቴዎስ፡ ፲፱፻፳፪ዓመተ፡ ምሕረት፡ ፲፯ቀን፡ ሰኔ፡ ተገዛ፡ ዘሰረቆ፡ ወዘፈሐቆ፡ በስልጣነ፡ ጴጥሮስ፡ ወጳውሎስ፡ ውጉዘ፡ ለይኩን፡ ለይኩን። ።
The note is partly erased, written in Amharic. The Ms. was sold by haläqa Gabra Ǝgziʾabḥer for 44 Bǝrr to ʾato Walda Mikāʾel Kahsay, on 17 Säne 1922 year of mercy (= 24 June, 1930 A.D.) in the time of rās Gugsa (d. March 1930?) and Metropolitan Matewos (d. December 1926). Many names of witnesses are also mentioned.

f. 106vb: Donation note.f. 106vb: ዝመጽሐፍ፡ ዘወይዘሮ፡ ብሪቱ፡ ዘተሣያጠቶ፡ በ፶፡ ብር፡ ወወሀበታ፡ ለማርያም፡ መይ፡ አብአ፡ ከመ፡ ይኩና፡ መርሐ፡ ለመንግሥተ፡ ሰማያት፡ ኦአበውየ፡ ኢትርስዑኒ፡ አቡነ፡ ዘበሰማያት፡
The note states that Walatta Bǝrritu bought the Ms. for 50 Bǝrr and donated it to the church of ʾAbʾa.
- Scribbles in the margins: fols. 5r, 56v, 57r, 90r, 95r, 103v. - The names of Walatta Māryām and Gabra Krǝstos are written in the supplication formulas, in modern pen: fols. 76v, 78rb.

binding.decoNote: Two wooden boards covered in reddish-brown tooled leather; textile inlays. Two pairs of sewing stations.
Two pairs of chains of endband stitches at the spine cover.
Blind tooled ornament on leather cover (at least 6 tools were used: cross hatching, waffles, triple line fillet, double circle, wave form, interlaced line fillet).

origin.origDate: According to the colophon the Ms. was completed on 9 Maskaram 1922 year of mercy (= 19 September 1929 A.D.), during the reign of Queen Zäwditu (r. 1916-30; baptismal name ʾAskalä Māryām).

person.persName: Walatta Bǝrritu is mentioned as the donor in Additio 3.

Accodring to Additio 2, the Ms. was sold by haläqa Gabra Ǝgziʾabǝḥer to ʾato Walda Mikāʾel Kahsay. Many other names are mentioned in the supplication formulas: Gabra Krǝstos (fols. 14va, 24vb, 26rb, 30ra, etc.), Walatta ʿAbiyä ʾƎgziʾ (fols. 13va, 37rb, 54vb, etc.), Walatta Māryām (fols. 15vb, 24ra, 24vb, 32ra, etc.), Gabra Masqal (fols. 24ra, 24vb, 27vb, 37rb, etc.), Walatta Śǝllāse (fols. 24vb, 50vb), Walatta ʾIyasus (fols. 30ra, 32ra, 87rb), Takla Hāymānot (fols. 43vb, 79ra, 95rb).
